system.description:
This delivery mechanism allows the contents of a super Stimpak to be dispersed into an aerosol cloud, providing a burst of medicinal vapor over a small area.

  • Use: When deployed, using the Interact minor action, it produces a cloud which immediately heals 4 HP on everyone (other than robots) within Close range. One super Stimpak is consumed every time the Stimpak diffuser is used.
system.effect: Heals 4 HP to all within Close range
